def has_bathroom_sink(sink:item):
    # Function to check if the sink is in a bathroom
    symbol has_bathroom_sink=exists room: item : is_bathroom(room) and inside(sink, room)
    return has_bathroom_sink

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists sink: item : is_sink(sink) and has_bathroom_sink(sink):
            # Check if there is a bathroom sink based on the available information
            bind sink: item where:
                is_sink(sink) and has_bathroom_sink(sink)
            achieve close_char(char, sink)
            # Move the character closer to the bathroom sink

        else:
            # If no bathroom sink is found, initiate exploration to locate one
            foreach sink: item:
                if is_sink(sink) and not visited(sink):
                    observe(sink, "Check if this is the bathroom sink")
                    # Observe whether each sink is located in the bathroom
